name: My RC Buggy! VR
description:
My RC Buggy! VR is a RC car themed room-scaled VR game with an emphasis on part collection

features:
  • "physically" picking up parts and putting your RC car together
  • create and customize your RC car with different combinations of bodies, wheels, motors and batteries
  • race in various tracks and unlock more parts
  • (beta feature) 1 on 1 racing against another player
  • good choice for people who hate motion sickness in VR
  • game can be played with one controller only
